attributes.long-description:
Aquattack! is an engrossing puzzle game set beneath the waves. The ocean's fish are being swept up in fishing nets, and need your help to escape. Slide rows of fish vertically and horizontally to create matches and set the fish free.
Aquattack! contains special items, like bombs and electric eels, that can free large numbers of fish, or remove obstacles that prevent rows from being moved.
Challenge Mode takes Aquattack! beyond standard puzzle mechanics to give you specific objectives in each stage, like setting off a chain of bombs in the right sequence, or completing a stage using only red fish.

Published by Valcon Games. Developed by Paper Planet Productions Limited.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
attributes.name: Aquattack!
